record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 24, 2007, AT 2 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 24, 2007, AT 2 P.M. -- (Senate - September 21, 2007)

[Page: S11965]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 2:24 p.m., adjourned until Monday, September 24, 2007, at 2 p.m.
